text:
Climate models have no predictive value.

https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/feart.2019.00223/full

Peer-reviewed and passed by distinguished climate scientists.

Mr. Brice Planck, the narrator, doesn't know what he's talking about. There is no reason to believe anything that the climate models forecast about future temperatures. The IPCC is hopelessly incompetent.

The world has been much warmer in the past than it is now. The Holocene Climate Optimum 8000 years ago was probably 4 degrees warmer than the present. The ecosphere throve during that time. 

All the evidence we have is that warmer climates are milder climates. Not stormier. Warmer is also wetter. Fewer droughts. 

During the seven or so ice ages over the past million years, air temperature changes led CO2 changes by about 500 years every single time. 

Going into an ice age, temperature went down. Hundreds of years later, CO2 went down. 100,000 years later (typically), when an ice age ended, first temperature rose. Then, some 500 years later, CO2 rose. Every single time.

Mr. Planck claimed the opposite is true. He is wrong; again not knowing what he's talking about.

There is no evidence -- zero -- that CO2 affected air temperature at any time all the way across 4 billion years of Geological history. 
See for yourself: http://www.biocab.org/Carbon_Dioxide_Geological_Timescale.html

All you readers out there should go about your life in serene confidence about CO2 and the climate. There is no reason to think that CO2 emissions will do anything to the climate.

The climate is warming now, to our benefit. It's warmed before, it's cooled before, all without any CO2 influence. No one knows why the climate moves about as it does. But it does, and all by itself.

In fact, the only thing we know increasing CO2 has done, is to green up the entire global eco-sphere. Green growth has increased globally by 15% since 1980, all due to increasing CO2. Including the Amazon rain forest, and the Sahel in Africa.

See for yourself: 
https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2016/carbon-dioxide-fertilization-greening-earth

Don't be scared. The whole global warming thing is a crock. Eat the meat you want (an evolutionary necessity in any case). 

Take joy in your family and friends, and have your babies in confidence of a better future, brought to you by the cheap and bountiful energy of fossil fuels.

And one last comment, this one of a political nature. Mr. Planck talks about the greed of corporations. His solution is to make the government owner of everything, pretty much a super corporation. Ownership and greed centralized and with police and military power over all of you (us). Does anyone out there think that's a smart move?

Crock upon crock. That's the story of climate change.

( بحسب التقويم الرسمي لأمّ القرى )



سلامُ الله عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته يا معشر البشر الذين إذا تبيّن لهم الحقُّ اتّبعوه، كونهم يستخدمون عقولهم فلا أحد يستطيعُ أن يستخفّ بعقولهم كونهم لن يسمحوا بذلك؛ أولئك الذين هداهم الله وأولئك هم أولو الألباب في كل زمان ومكان، ولذلك تجدون الفتوى الحق من الله عن سبب دخول أهل النار في النار وهو الاستخفاف بالعقول وعدم استخدامها، تصديقاً لقول الله تعالى: {وَقَالُوا لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِي أَصْحَابِ السَّعِيرِ ﴿١٠﴾} صدق الله العظيم [الملك].
وربما يودّ كافّة الباحثين أن يقولوا: "ومن ذا الذي يستطيع أن يسْتَخفّ بعقولنا؟ فنحن بشر ميّزنا اللهُ عنْ الأنعامِ بِنعمة العقل، ومن لا يستخدم عقله فهو كالأنعام، فلا أنت يا ناصر محمد اليماني تستطيع أن تسْتَخِفّ بعقولنا ولا كافّة الذين يصدّون عن آيات التصديق من الله لدعوتك؛ إن كنت من الصادقين حتماً يُصدِقك الله وحدك فيصبحَ الصادّون من الكاذبين." فمن ثمّ يقيم الإمام المهدي ناصر محمد اليماني الحجة على الجميع وأقول: اكتبوا كلمة بحث في قوقل وفي القنوات كما يلي:
"رُبّ ضارة نافعة فايروس كورونا"
وسوف تجدون أنّ علماء المناخ بما فيهم وكالة ناسا وكذلك كافّة الأساتذة والباحثين يقولون: "إنّ فايروس كورونا استطاع أن يحقّق ما لم تحقّقه اتفاقية باريس للمناخ! كونه وقّف مصانع البشر وسياراتهم حتى خفّ عادم ثاني أوكسيد الكربون المُتصاعد إلى غلاف الكرة الأرضية؛ فهذا يعني أنّ فايروس كورونا حلّ مشكلة المناخ كونه حتماً خفّف خمسين في المائة من ثاني أوكسيد الكربون الصاعد من سكّان الأرض إلى غلافها الجويّ العلويّ، وأنّ هذا يعني أنّه خفّف كثيراً من الاحتباس الحراريّ، وأنّ هذه بُشرى." يخفّف من كوارث الطبيعة من فيضاناتٍ وأعاصيرَ وزلازلَ وغيرها من كوارث الطبيعة الذين زعموا أنّها بسبب الاحتباس الحراري، فإذا هم يتفاجأون في صيف عشرين عشرين ما لم يكونوا يحتسبون، ولم تخفّ كوارثُ الطبيعة شيئاً بل تضاعفت الفيضانات والأعاصير البحريّة والبرّية والزلازل وغيرها بما يسمونها (كوارث التقلّبات المناخيّة) بسبب الاحتباس الحراري.
كَذّبهم الله بحوله وقوته وأفسد نظرية الاحتباس الحراري! ليعلم البشر العُقلاء أنّه حقّاً كوارث التغيّرات المناخيّة أنّها ليست بسبب الاحتباس الحراري للأرض؛ بل سببها كوكب العذاب (نيبيرو) سقر الذي يحذّر منه المهديّ المنتظر ناصر محمد اليماني منذ ستة عشر عاماً، ولذلك بعث الله فايروس كورونا ليثبت افتراءهم فينسف نظريّة الاحتباس الحراري! ليتبيّن لكافّة البشر أنّ ما يُنذر منه المهديّ المنتظر ناصر محمد اليماني منذ ستة عشر عاماً أنّ سبب حربِ اللهِ المناخيّة هي حقاً بسبب اقتراب كوكب سقر، فيحدث التناوش لحرب الله المناخيّة قبل مروره نذيرًا للبشر، فهل تناقض الإمام المهديّ ناصر محمد اليماني ؟

والصادّون عن حقائق آيات الله المجرمون يتناقضون ومُصرّون على تكبّرهم وغرورهم، ومن اتّبعهم استخفّوا بعقولهم فأضلّوهم ولن يُغنوا عنهم من عذاب الله شيئًا، والقادم أعظم، اللهم قد بلغت.. اللهم فاشهد.
وسلامٌ على المُرسَلين والحمدُ للهِ ربِّ العالمين..
خليفة الله وعبدُه الإمام المهديّ ناصر محمد اليماني.

text:
Sir David Attenborough has said that reforesting our lands and feeding our populations with better food using modern technology is the best solution for ourselves and our planet. 

https://youtu.be/c3bdUk4qa0Y

Many people have believed the carbon dioxide demon when the truth is quite evidently right in front of their eyes. The stripping of forests for plantations and habitats has changed the climate. 

The planet’s climate has been controlled by life forms for 3 billion years as seen by earths carbon dioxide level of a mere 0.04% against our two neighbours mars and Venus that have 90%+ carbon dioxide. The burgeoning human population struggled to feed its own with grains that caused forests that bound soils and moisture to be ripped up and replaced with dry fields with no topsoil retention. So plant life’s grip on the climate was weakened and the climate shifted slightly. 

The solution is to return the forests and feed the population at the same time. New plant factories in the Netherlands (53°N) are able to compete with agriculture in the tropics to produce our food in a fraction of the space and with a fraction of the water required by conventional agriculture.

Build plant factories to feed 7.8 billion people and liberate land and water for forests
https://youtu.be/dnCQuwCtqJg
https://youtu.be/qGyAeqdkkbw
https://youtu.be/ESuzrY2abAw

See examples of working plant factories
https://youtu.be/5clOYWsNhhk
https://youtu.be/4CMfPLEtQMQ

Use cattle herds to revitalise soil
https://youtu.be/vpTHi7O66pI

Use goats to reduce fire dangers in forests
https://youtu.be/g9yiclBCxMo 

Use agrivoltaics to turn deserts into meadows with solar panels
https://youtu.be/XwFB22r9zRo
https://youtu.be/CS3bBO05fpU

Use marine cloud seeding to moisten and seed ocean air for clouds and rain
https://youtu.be/Awf1W0-UMR4

Use minerals to assist salmon populations 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haida_Salmon_Restoration_Corporation

Don’t be misanthropic. Be positive. Be useful. Help flora and fauna control climate and don’t demonise plant food (carbon dioxide).

It’s now possible with plant factories to make a country like Britain self-sufficient in food and return its arable land to forests. It just requires the focus of resources.

The individual can also help reducing the rape of forests by moving away from grains into plant and animal fats and proteins with the keto diet and live longer and healthier lives.

author: mem

text:
@mem  "sulfur dioxide isn't considered a greenhouse gas in the direct manner the others are."

True, Sulfur Dioxide needs to mix with water vapor in the upper atmosphere to become a powerful absorber of IR radiation but it doesn't make any difference in its cooling effect.   
After Mt. Pinatubo erupted, all that Sulfur Dioxide cooled the Earth by 3C.  IT DID NOT WARM THE EARTH? 
It DID keep in some warmth, but it kept out more, much more.  
Why?
Because it is the SUN that warms the Earth, and if you block out the Sun's heat, the earth gets cool, just like Clouds do because they are made of water molecules, which are powerful absorbers of IR radiation.

"also - clouds cool the earth by reflecting sunlight back, which is not a property of typical water vapor."

How exactly does a cloud  "cool the earth by reflecting sunlight back"?
Mind you I'm not surprised that you have no education in Quantum Physics most people don't>
So let me give you a short lesson.

1.  There are three quantum states that may be changed by the absorption of a photon by an atom. 
a. The State of Torsion and Rotation.  Microwaves change this state, and cause the atom to either bend or to rotate 180 degrees, as if its magnetic poles shifted.  This method of shifting teh magnetic pole of the atom is how magnetic induction plates create heat in metal pans.  It is also how an MRI works at the hospital.


b. The Vibrational State.  Infrared photons change this state.  It causes the atom to vibrate faster
c. The Energetic State.  Visible light photons change this state.  This causes an electron, in a low orbit around the nucleus of the atom to jump to a higher orbit matching the energy of the absorbed photon.  At the higher orbit, it then emits the photon out and falls back to its original orbit.  

2.  It is the Electron in orbit around the nucleus, that absorbs the visible light photon, NOT THE MOLECULE NOR THE ATOM.  It makes NO difference whether the electron is part of a water molecule, or ice, or vapor.  The electron reacts to the Photon in the exact same way in all three states of matter.  
It absorbs the photon of visible light, jumps to a higher orbit matching the energy of the absorbed photon.  At the higher orbit, it then emits out the photon and falls back to the lower orbit.

3.  Because the Law of Conservation of Momentum does NOT affect Quanta when the electron emits out the photon it absorbed, it has no original momentum.  Thus, the photon is emitted out in a totally random direction having no relationship to its original direction of travel.  Therefore, the electron acts like a little sun sending out photons of visible light in every direction.  Some go down some go up; some go back some go forward; some go to the right some go to the left.  

4.  The more water molecules there are, the more electrons there are, so the more visible light photons will be absorbed.  Water molecules are packed together more tightly when in their liquid state than they are when in their vaporous state.  This means that the tiny water droplets that make up a cloud absorb more effectively than water vapor does because there are more electrons per cubic millimeter of space than there are when it is a vapor.
But the electron in the vaporous state absorbs and interacts with the visible light photon in the exact same way as when it is in its liquid state.

text:
16. How Much Should Be The World's Population

How much population should the world have, that our earth can handle the pollution created by our work in which no harm comes to any living beings and the earth, it should be researched and that population has to be maintained.

For example if our earth can handle pollution of 1 billion people, then the world should have only 1 billion people only. We would have to have one child only from now on till the population reaches 1 billion. As if everybody had only one child, population will decrease. After that everyone can have 2 children's. When 2 children's are born, then population will increase. When the population reaches 1.5 billion, then everyone should have only one child till the population reaches back to 1 billion. After that everyone can have 2 children's. In this way population can be maintained. 

But if the world doesn't want to keep the population limited, then this would lead to disasters. The world should not want that to happen. 

In countries like india and china population is too much. In china people's are having 1 child only. In india the government has said to people to have 1 child only, but it is not followed. India has to agree to have one child only. Even if india agreed, still it would take a long time to reduce population for both countries. 
To reduce population fast, this method should be used. 
Couples would be 1st born, 2nd, 3rd, 4th and so on. In this when a person is marrying another person, and they are 1st and 2nd born and also their father, mother and grandparents are 1st and 2nd born, then they can have 2 children's.
If the persons marrying each other are 1st and 2nd born, but the man's father or mother or grandfather or grandmother is 3rd born, 4th and so on, and the woman's father, mother and grandparents are 1st or 2nd born, then they can have 1 children. Also if the man is 3rd born, 4th and so on and his wife is 1st or 2nd born and wife's mother, father and grandparents are also 1st and 2nd born, then they can 1 children.
If the man is 3rd born or 4th and so on and also his wife is 3rd born or 4th and so on, then they should not have any children's.
If a man and woman are 1st or 2nd born, but both their father's, mother's or grandparents are 3rd born or 4th and so on, then they should not have any children's. In this way population can be reduced fast.

17. We Can Reduce Eating Non Vegetarian Foods If Population Is Less

If population is less, then we can reduce eating non vegetarian foods as it is said that non vegetarian foods are causes of some problems in humans. 
If some cold countries have less vegetarian foods, then they can import vegetarian foods from other countries who have more vegetarian foods.
Non Vegetarian foods should be consumed only once a week. We must eat eggs once every week, take wednesday as the day. And on every sunday we should eat one non vegetarian food.
On one sunday eat chicken, next sunday eat goat, next sunday eat pig, next sunday eat fish and next sunday eat cow and stop eating meat of all other animals. 
In india country people do not eat cow and only a few people eat pig, so india on one sunday should eat chicken, next sunday goat and next sunday fish. In pakistan pigs are not eaten, so pakistan on one sunday should eat chicken, next sunday eat goat, next sunday eat fish and next sunday eat cow.
If this is followed then the world won't need to do fishing much as because of too much fishing some big fishes like sharks and whales and penguins would get less fishes to eat. We should do fishing of small fishes only, not of big fishes such as sharks and whales.
author: shiva koliar

text:
10. We Can Stop Eating Sweets, Cakes And Stop Drinking Liquor, Wine And Beer

We consume sweets and cakes. We make it from many things such as wheat, coconut, etc. and add sugar to it. But what we want is the sweet thing to consume which we are getting directly from fruits. The fruit is naturally sweet. So if we want to consume sweets and cakes, we do not have to prepare it, just we have to eat fruits. So all the sweet manufacturing companies can be shut down. If you shut down a sweet manufacturing company, then so many paper boxes need not be manufactured which are used to pack the sweets.
Liquor, wine and beer are also made from fruits. So if you want to consume liquor, wine and beer, just eat fruits. If this is followed, then you do not have to set up liquor factories and prepare cartoon boxes for liquors. Send everybody to the rehabilitation centres those who can't live without liquor.

11. To Stop Using Perfumes And Powders Which Is Not A Necessity

Women's could simply keep a flower in their hair instead of using perfumes and powders. For men, it can't be helped. For bad smell in body both men and women should exercise and sweat, it would reduce the bad smell.
If you stop using perfumes and powders, we don't need perfume and powder manufacturing companies. So many perfume and powder bottles need not be manufactured, cartoon boxes need not be manufactured for packing them and transportations can be reduced. All of this would result in less pollution.

12. Could We Stop Drinking Cow's and Buffalo's Milk

Whatever vitamins and nutrients we get from milk, if we can get it from other eatable things, then we can stop drinking cow's and buffalo's milk. As milk has to be packed in glass bottles and plastic packs and then transported to places. All of this can be stopped. 
For infants whose mother's have died or mother's who cannot breast feed their infants, only for them cow's and buffalo's milk should be given. We use milk in tea and coffee. Instead of milk we must use lime with tea and coffee. A lime should be cut into a few pieces and cooked with tea and coffee or something else can be used instead of lime.

13. A Manufacturing Company Which Is Not A Necessity For Human Beings, If It Is Stopped, Then We Have The Following Benefits

When a manufacturing company which is not a necessity for human beings, if it is stopped, then we have the following benefits.
That company which is built in a place, that much land is saved, machines does not have to be manufactured, for machines to operate oil is needed and many other things, for which we have to make oil manufacturing company and all other companies for all other things like cartoon boxes, plastic ropes and plastic cans, registers, pencil, pen, stationery products. To make cartoon boxes papers are required and to stick papers gums are required. To make gums so much dough is needed and caustic soda is needed. If we don't manufacture cartoon boxes then that dough can be eaten. Transportation is needed to deliver things to all the shops. Roads have to be constructed. For transportation we need vehicles and to operate vehicles petrol is needed, to get petrol we have to set up oil rig platforms in the sea or land and to deliver petrol to a petrol pump that petrol is needed to be put in a drum, a plastic drum has to be manufactured and then many ships have to be manufactured for shipping the petrol to all the places. For all this works so much land is lost and so much pollution is created, from that pollution humans, land animals, sea animals, aerial animals and earth is suffering. Also many transportation items which requires huge trucks for transportation a driver has to drive only at night and his day life is lost. Surely at night time driving the driver would become sleepy sometimes and accidents do happen. 
All of this can be reduced and this will be our benefits if we stopped a manufacturing company which is not a necessity for human beings. When you stop making a manufacturing company then all the problems related with it won't occur.

Due to coronavirus pandemic it would be better if we don't open the companies which are not required as a necessity for humans. It would be help in preventing from the coronavirus pandemic.

14. Why We Should Manufacture Less Nutrient Foods Like Horlicks And Bournvita

Bournvita, Horlicks should be given to only persons who cannot exercise and are too weak. For others who have deficiency and are not too weak, they should eat natural foods and exercise so that the foods would get absorbed well in their body and their deficiency would be alright. If still they cannot exercise and get tired easily, they could do some light exercises or yoga in their spare time which would take long to get tired. If this is done, we won't have to prepare so many horlicks, bournvita and other nutrients foods like that. So then we don't have to prepare the plastic, glass or paper pack bottles and hence less pollution.

15. To Reduce Television Time

Television programs is for 24 hours a day. A human works for 8 hours a day, 1 hour for getting ready in the morning, travelling time assume for 2 hours a day, half an hour would be spent in relaxing, talking to friend's for half an hour, talking with family for half an hour, 1 hour spent in a park and sleeping time for 6 hours. Altogether 19 and half hours are spent for weekdays. So only 4 and half hours are left. In that why television is then for 24 hours. Well non working women's and students going to schools and colleges have extra free time. As television is for 24 hours now, then many students instead of spending their time in studying watch television more and study less. Non working women’s in their free time instead of watching television could do some other activities. Television should be shown in evening from 7pm to 8pm, cartoon shows should be shown for kids at that time. From 8pm to 9pm teenagers programs should be shown. From 9pm to 11pm programs should be shown for grown-up peoples. If you watch colour television for more than 2 hours, the rays coming from television affects your health and eyes.

At present due to problems going on in the world, 24 hours news channels are required. So we can keep news channels for 24 hours. Sports channels can also be shown for 24 hours. 

On Sundays television can be shown for 9 to 11am in the morning and 2 to 5pm in the afternoon and 7 to 11pm in the evening.

Also in a year so many movies are made. In a year there are 52 weeks, so only 52 movies should be produced in one country. One Sunday one movie should be watched. Their should be no production of video or CD cassettes of the picture, only uploaded in the internet, so that if anyone wants to watch any movie again, they can download and watch it again. 

Also if their are only 52 movies in a week, there would be less downloading of movies in the whole world due to which there would be less amount of internet radiation.

text:
Global Warming:  In a Nutshell:
The photonic energy emitted by the sun as visible light and infrared radiation strikes the Earth’s surface. The visible light that is not reflected away is converted into additional infrared radiation which is felt as heat as it is re-emitted back towards space wherein this photonic energy begins to interact with the larger atmospheric molecules. Known as the greenhouse effect, it keeps the planet from freezing over.
Note: An increase in larger atmospheric molecules strengthens the greenhouse effect.

text:
semnează acum, sign now :
https://secure.avaaz.org/campaign/en/youtube_climate_misinformation/

Avaaz tocmai a scos la iveală un scandal imens: în timp ce lumea noastră e în flăcări, YouTube distribuie clipuri care neagă încălzirea globală către milioane de oameni! Raportul nostru e pe prima pagina a știrilor, însă știm că acești giganți tech nu vor acționa urgent decât dacă brandul le e pus în pericol, iar clienții lor de publicitate iau atitudine. Aici intrăm noi în acțiune! Hai să inundăm YouTube și pe clienții lor de publicitate cu constatările raportului nostru, să le înconjurăm sediile cu panouri publicitare informative și să menținem presiunea până când YouTube și toți giganții rețelelor sociale opresc distribuția minciunilor către milioane de oameni! 
SEMNEAZĂ ACUM

Dragi prieteni și prietene, 

Avaaz tocmai a scos la iveală un scandal imens: în timp ce lumea noastră e în flăcări, YouTube distribuie clipuri care neagă încălzirea globală către milioane de oameni!

Și asta nu e tot: mai face și bani din asta…

Tocmai am lansat raportul, iar YouTube simte presiune din partea mass-media. Însă știm că acești giganți din domeniul tehnologiei nu vor acționa urgent decât dacă brandul le e pus în pericol, iar principalii lor clienți de publicitate iau atitudine.

Aici intrăm noi în acțiune!

Hai să inundăm YouTube și pe clienții lor principali de publicitate cu constatările raportului nostru, apoi să mergem cu apelul la FIECARE rețea socială importantă, să le informăm angajații și autoritățile de reglementare și să menținem presiunea până când YouTube oprește distribuția minciunilor către milioane de oameni! 

Alătură-te acestui apel global. Semnează acum 

Când au căutat “global warming” (încălzire globală) și “climate change” (schimbări climatice), cercetătorii Avaaz au descoperit că algoritmul YouTube prezintă clipuri de dezinformare care au adunat milioane și milioane de vizualizări. Clipurile susțin că încălzirea globală e o „farsă”, că oamenii de știință greșesc și că învinuirea oamenilor pentru acest fenomen este o „înșelătorie”. 

Nu e vorba doar despre YouTube. Majoritatea algoritmilor din rețelele sociale sunt programați pentru a maximiza timpul petrecut pe platforma respectivă, chiar dacă acest lucru implică milioane de oameni care urmăresc teorii ale conspirației fără sens și dezinformare crasă.

The Guardian, TIME și alte obiective media influente din întreaga lume au scris despre descoperirile noastre. Dacă ne oprim acum, impactul media ar putea să scadă și lucrurile s-ar putea întoarce la normal. Nu putem permite ca acest lucru să se întâmple.

Așadar, hai să creăm un precedent, să demonstrăm companiei YouTube și altor giganți ai rețelelor sociale că milioane de oameni vor să acționeze de urgență în această privință. Hai să aducem de partea noastră atât clienții de publicitate, cât și pe angajații lor, pentru a-i determina să schimbe cursul. Semnează acum, apoi citește raportul nostru și trimite-l tuturor prietenilor tăi: 

Alătură-te acestui apel global. Semnează acum 

Această mișcare este formată din milioane de cetățeni care cred într-o lume mai bună și luptă pentru ea. Membrii Avaaz din fiecare colț al acestei planete ne-au finanțat investigația despre dezinformarea climatică și ne-au ajutat să creăm acest val uriaș în presă, precum și oportunitatea pentru schimbare. Am ajuns lideri de opinie în această apărare globală a adevărului pentru că, indiferent dacă e vorba despre schimbări climatice, sănătate publică sau viitorul democrației în sine, avem nevoie de fapte pentru a găsi soluțiile care ne salvează pe toți.

Cu respect și recunoștință,

Flora, Alaphia, Christoph, Anneke, Muriel, Nataliya, Fadi și restul echipei Avaaz

During the evaporation process, the salt and the other natural chemicals, are left in the sea, so  If the ice never melts, the ocean natural chemistry will finally become unbalanced and the ocean will finally die, just like the dead salt sea in Israel,

text:
although I agree with a lot of your points just want to point out that the graph at 2:34 is unreliable and does not support the claims you've made.


First off the range should be larger to accommodate the peak at the year 2007. Furthermore this variable looks to be an outlier and the way the graph is set up makes it look like it is important when it should really be ignored. It also skews the rest of the graph, which may make it look like CO2 concentration correlate more with temperature then they actually do. Correlation also does not imply causation. This graph alone does not provide sufficient evidence to back up the claim that CO2 concentration causes temperature variances. Finally, any data before 1850 for temperature and 1950 for Co2 concentration is guesswork and unreliable information.

text:
According to the Vostok Ice Core Records, CO2 level changes have followed Earth's overall temperature changes at an 800 year lag for the last 800,000 years.  That means that our current CO2 levels are the result of Earth's overall temperature 800 years ago.  World leaders have convinced their dependents that this works in the reverse order, relatively quickly, and that we are to blame, so that they can tax us out of a false shared guilt in order to be able to afford to "fight" climate change, an unstoppable natural cycle.  The following is the source of this information:

Historical Carbon Dioxide Record from the Vostok Ice Core

Investigators
J.-M. Barnola, D. Raynaud, C. Lorius
Laboratoire de Glaciologie et de Géophysique de l'Environnement,
CNRS, BP96,
38402 Saint Martin d'Heres Cedex, France

N.I. Barkov
Arctic and Antarctic Research Institute,
Beringa Street 38, 199397,
St. Petersburg, Russia

Period of Record
417,160 - 2,342 years BP

Methods
In January 1998, the collaborative ice-drilling project between Russia, the United States, and France at the Russian Vostok station in East Antarctica yielded the deepest ice core ever recovered, reaching a depth of 3,623 m (Petit et al. 1997, 1999). Ice cores are unique with their entrapped air inclusions enabling direct records of past changes in atmospheric trace-gas composition. Preliminary data indicate the Vostok ice-core record extends through four climate cycles, with ice slightly older than 400 kyr (Petit et al. 1997, 1999). Because air bubbles do not close at the surface of the ice sheet but only near the firn-ice transition (that is, at ~90 m below the surface at Vostok), the air extracted from the ice is younger than the surrounding ice (Barnola et al. 1991). Using semiempirical models of densification applied to past Vostok climate conditions, Barnola et al. (1991) reported that the age difference between air and ice may be ~6000 years during the coldest periods instead of ~4000 years, as previously assumed. Ice samples were cut with a bandsaw in a cold room (at about -15°C) as close as possible to the center of the core in order to avoid surface contamination (Barnola et al. 1983). Gas extraction and measurements were performed with the "Grenoble analytical setup," which involved crushing the ice sample (~40 g) under vacuum in a stainless-steel container without melting it, expanding the gas released during the crushing in a pre-evacuated sampling loop, and analyzing the CO2 concentrations by gas chromatography (Barnola et al. 1983). The analytical system, except for the stainless-steel container in which the ice was crushed, was calibrated for each ice sample measurement with a standard mixture of CO2 in nitrogen and oxygen. For further details on the experimental procedures and the dating of the successive ice layers at Vostok, see Barnola et al. (1987, 1991), Lorius et al. (1985), and Petit et al. (1999).

Trends
There is a close correlation between Antarctic temperature and atmospheric concentrations of CO2 (Barnola et al. 1987). The extension of the Vostok CO2 record shows that the main trends of CO2 are similar for each glacial cycle. Major transitions from the lowest to the highest values are associated with glacial-interglacial transitions. During these transitions, the atmospheric concentrations of CO2 rises from 180 to 280-300 ppmv (Petit et al. 1999). The extension of the Vostok CO2 record shows the present-day levels of CO2 are unprecedented during the past 420 kyr. Pre-industrial Holocene levels (~280 ppmv) are found during all interglacials, with the highest values (~300 ppmv) found approximately 323 kyr BP. When the Vostok ice core data were compared with other ice core data (Delmas et al. 1980; Neftel et al. 1982) for the past 30,000 - 40,000 years, good agreement was found between the records: all show low CO2 values [~200 parts per million by volume (ppmv)] during the Last Glacial Maximum and increased atmospheric CO2 concentrations associated with the glacial-Holocene transition. According to Barnola et al. (1991) and Petit et al. (1999) these measurements indicate that, at the beginning of the deglaciations, the CO2 increase either was in phase or lagged by less than ~1000 years with respect to the Antarctic temperature, whereas it clearly lagged behind the temperature at the onset of the glaciations.

References
Barnola, J.-M., D. Raynaud, A. Neftel, and H. Oeschger. 1983. Comparison of CO2 measurements by two laboratories on air from bubbles in polar ice. Nature 303:410-13.

Barnola, J.-M., D. Raynaud, Y.S. Korotkevich, and C. Lorius. 1987. Vostok ice core provides 160,000-year record of atmospheric CO2. Nature 329:408-14.

Barnola, J.-M., P. Pimienta, D. Raynaud, and Y.S. Korotkevich. 1991. CO2-climate relationship as deduced from the Vostok ice core: A re-examination based on new measurements and on a re-evaluation of the air dating. Tellus 43(B):83- 90.

Delmas, R.J., J.-M. Ascencio, and M. Legrand. 1980. Polar ice evidence that atmospheric CO2 20,000 yr BP was 50% of present. Nature 284:155-57.

Jouzel, J., C. Lorius, J.R. Petit, C. Genthon, N.I. Barkov, V.M. Kotlyakov, and V.M. Petrov. 1987. Vostok ice core: A continuous isotopic temperature record over the last climatic cycle (160,000 years). Nature 329:403-8.

Lorius, C., J. Jouzel, C. Ritz, L. Merlivat, N.I. Barkov, Y.S. Korotkevich, and V.M. Kotlyakov. 1985. A 150,000-year climatic record from Antarctic ice. Nature 316:591-96.

Neftel, A., H. Oeschger, J. Schwander, B. Stauffer, and R. Zumbrunn. 1982. Ice core measurements give atmospheric CO2 content during the past 40,000 yr. Nature 295:220-23.

Pepin, L., D. Raynaud, J.-M. Barnola, and M.F. Loutre. 2001. Hemispheric roles of climate forcings during glacial-interglacial transitions as deduced from the Vostok record and LLN-2D model experiments. Journal of Geophysical Research 106 (D23): 31,885-31,892.

Petit, J.R., I. Basile, A. Leruyuet, D. Raynaud, C. Lorius, J. Jouzel, M. Stievenard, V.Y. Lipenkov, N.I. Barkov, B.B. Kudryashov, M. Davis, E. Saltzman, and V. Kotlyakov. 1997. Four climate cycles in Vostok ice core. Nature 387: 359-360.

Petit, J.R., J. Jouzel, D. Raynaud, N.I. Barkov, J.-M. Barnola, I. Basile, M. Benders, J. Chappellaz, M. Davis, G. Delayque, M. Delmotte, V.M. Kotlyakov, M. Legrand, V.Y. Lipenkov, C. Lorius, L. Pépin, C. Ritz, E. Saltzman, and M. Stievenard. 1999. Climate and atmospheric history of the past 420,000 years from the Vostok ice core, Antarctica. Nature 399: 429-436.

Raynaud, D., and J.-M. Barnola. 1985. An Antarctic ice core reveals atmospheric CO2 variations over the past few centuries. Nature 315:309-11.

CITE AS: Barnola, J.-M., D. Raynaud, C. Lorius, and N.I. Barkov. 2003. Historical CO2 record from the Vostok ice core. In Trends: A Compendium of Data on Global Change. Carbon Dioxide Information Analysis Center, Oak Ridge National Laboratory, U.S. Department of Energy, Oak Ridge, Tenn., U.S.A.

Revised February 2003

text: Human made global warming is a scientific fact and in the future could be a direct danger to our survival. Therefore, all politics should mainly focus to solve this issue, globally and cooperatively. The government could invest into research of renewable energy sources like solar, wind, fusion, but also developing electronic cars, making them less expensive and building more corresponding fueling stations. A complete exit out of coal and oil ought to be strived for. But the average civizen can also help: Vote a rational party with relevant priorities, Don't fly with plane, buy mainly local food, throw less leftovers away, heat less, shower/bath less, and don't eat meat or other animal products. These things are all unnecessary. Especially the whole animal industry, that contributes to most (51%) of the green house gases (methane is 20x more effective than CO2) and is directly responsible for 91% of cutting down forrests. text: John OSullivan refusing to rise? Global average surface temperatures have steadily been increasing since the 80s. And in a period with lower solar activity. Who are these scientists you speak of?
author: Væringjar

text: @Væringjar  we live in an interglacial epoch. As such, global temps have mostly been rising for 11,000 years (Holocene Period). But it cooled during the Little Ice Age 1400-1830's.  Our climate always varies, it was 2 to 4 degrees warmer in the Medieval Warm Period (before 600 years ago). Temps changes are closely correlated to changing solar sunspots (see Milankovich Cycles). Human activities have no measurable impact. Principia Scientific International has 3,600+ members, one third with science PhD's who reject the climate fraud. Check the facts, reject the alarmist hype.
author: John OSullivan

text:
John OSullivan way to change the argument, so you do accept that temperatures are on the rise? And yes, of course temperatures has been rising since the last largest glacial extent, you have to absolutely daft to not count that in to your models. And no, it wasn’t warmer during the medieval warm period: https://www.temperaturerecord.org 

Milankovitch cycles does NOT explain current rise in temperatures, natural forcing should result in a slight warming, but not at all at the level we’re experiencing: https://images.app.goo.gl/RzAo3B4hHBiEVCE99
author: Væringjar

text: @Væringjar  My son is a professional metrologist (look it up) anyone in his profession will tell you it is impossible to calibrate a global temperature within a 0.5 degrees margin of error. Thus, the 'temperature data' you cite is invalid because the margin of error in a standard mercury thermometer is > 0.5 degrees. Therefore, the entire 'temperature rise' claimed by alarmist is entirely explainable as statistical noise.
author: John OSullivan

text: John OSullivan Hahaha. Yeah, because global average temperatures are only measured once a year in one place. Put your son on the line, i’d like to discuss that with him.

Also, that the really damaging fact against an 'average global temperature' is it is known among scientists as a fake metric that “has no physical meaning.” Those are the words o Dr Darko Butina, who won Britain’s prestigious Queen’s Award for science during a successful career with Glaxo Research. Dr Butina exposes the alarmist lies about global temperatures here: https://principia-scientific.org/top-carbon-scientist-busts-average-global-temperature-meme/

text:
EXPERIMENTAL FACTS: When CO2 doubles from 357 ppm to 714 ppm the amount of IR adsorbed increases by 00.17%. That's undisputed experimental fact. All within a few feet of the ground. 90% of all CO2 IR adsorption are within 15 feet of the source. All adsorbed IR is converted to kinetic energy. There is no trapped heat, no feedback, no return IR warming of the Earth, no greenhouse effect and no correlation between CO2 ppm and climate change.
> Atmospheric CO2 ppm changes do not cause climate warm periods, climate cool periods or Ice Ages.
> CO2 is not a pollutant. It is an essential plant nutrient. Earth plant life is optimized for 800 ppm CO2 content. That promotes maximum plant health and growth.

text: The idea that Co2 is a greenhouse gas is not debatable according to NASA.  It is perfectly normal to not believe in climate change if one lives in a city or place that is not affected  much by it. We can't see the Co2 absorption of infra red radiation since it happens on the very small scale which is invisible to the naked eye on the molecular and atomic level. Also infra red radiation is invisible to the naked eye. We need night vision glasses to see it.  The ground state of the electron cloud of every molecule and atom is equal to a certain wavelength and it will only absorb electromagnetic radiation at an exact wavelength. Carbon dioxide  will only absorb EMR at the infra red wavelength. All other radiation gamma, x rays, ultra violet, visible light and radio waves pass right through the Co2 molecule but NOT infra red. Co2 absorbs it.  When the Sunlight in the visible light and some ultra violet hits the ground, it is absorbed and heats up. The ground emits this thermal energy as infra red, a light our eyes can't see. The infra red gets absorbed by the  Co2 molecules which vibrate and rotate which is the same as heat. The co2 molecules heat the air and the ground since some infra red radiation is  reflected back towards the ground.  The energy levels are different in every atom and molecule so that each molecule has its own spectra, a unique fingerprint which allows us to tell what the elements in stars and planetary atmospheres without ever traveling there.  Every gas has its unique absorption and emission spectra.  One can get a telescope and put on a spectrascope or  diffraction grating and see the spectra of Venus for example. It will show Co2 spectra which is at the infra red wavelength.  The spectra or spectral bands and lines ARE the energy levels unique to that atom. Everywhere in the universe Co2 will  always show an infra red spectral absorption lines.

text: Dinosaur bones have been found on the continent of Ant Arctica  which were dated 70 million years ago. Also plant fossils were found which can only grow in a warm climate.  The north and south polar caps only began to form about 20 million years ago, but 50 million years ago there were mass extinctions due to climate change from the removal of the carbon dioxide from the atmosphere by plant photosynthesis which removes CO2 and replaces it with oxygen. Also the carbon cycle has removed some of the CO2.  There were max extinctions in the polar regions 50 million years ago due to a drop in temperature there from a drop in carbon dioxide levels.  We do know what the climate of the past billion years is due to the oxygen 16 18 isotope ratio which tells the ice covering level, temperature and rainfall. These can be found in the fossil shells of dead animals.  70 million years ago, the CO2 level was over 500 ppm and the temperatures were higher but not so high that no animals can live.  Today's animals can't survive then because they have become adapted to through evolution to todays lower temperatures.  The mass extinctions of the past are due to animals of that time being adapted to warmer temperatures.  If we raise the temperature, then we can have mass extinctions.  Also the sea level was 280 feet higher 70 million years ago due to the carbon dioxide levels being higher than 500 ppm which is why we don't want to go above that level in the future.  We also have to remove some of the CO2 and get it back down to 280ppm, otherwise we will have a permanent sea level rise of at least 20 feet since the CO2 level was 415 ppm in the Pliocene and see level was over 20 feet higher.  Plants and the carbon cycle have drawn down the CO levels over millions of years and we put a lot of it  back in only 170 years.  The science which supports climate change is not simple, but complex and to understand it one need a broad scientific knowledge to see what supports it which includes meteorology, climatology, geology, geochemistry, chemistry, quantum field theory, quantum physics, and astrophysics.
author: Geoffrey Hillend

If we increase the average temperature, there is more evaporation of sea water, more clouds and more warm air to hold more water. Hurricanes grow from warm air and the warmer the air the bigger the storm.  There is 10 percent more water vapor in the air since 1900.

text: The Eocene is explained very simply. The Co2 levels were much higher in the past due to much more active volcanoes.  350 million years ago the Co2 levels were more than 2000 parts per million. 100 million years ago the Co2 was 1500 parts per million. The carbon cycle,  plants took the Co2 out of the atmosphere. This took many millions of years. Also the growth of mountains through basalt rocks helped remove Co2. By the time we get to the Eocene it is down to 400 parts per million.  In 1850 it was 280 PPM. We put that all back in only one hundred an fifty years of coal burning. Coal is made of Carbon. C + O2 or molecular oxygen is Co2.

text:
Solutions For Pollution Problems

1. Many Production Companies Has To Be Stopped

We manufacture so many products and it is creating pollution and pollution has increased to such an extent that it has become a threat to the world. After 2045 climate change would give more problems and by 2100 we would start having major natural disasters. So if we can minimise our products, pollution would be less.
We produce so many things which we do not need as a necessity, like cold drinks, leather products, potato wafers, chips, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. Cold drinks, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. should be cooked at home only. Instead of cold drinks people should drink natural drinks such as lime water, coconut water or just any fruit, not any fruit juice, just the whole fruit which can be prepared or served when a customer comes in a shop, hotel or a person selling this drinks on a street and serve it to him. If we stopped producing this things so much pollution could be reduced. Also these companies need so much water and electricity, we could give that water and electricity to places where water and electricity supply is less. As the world is facing pollution problems, we should stop producing things which is not a necessity for humans. In this way we would create less pollution. These companies require so much boring underground water, the water when pumped out of the ground they flatten and sink the ground.
If we colour the clothes pollution occurs. So if we don't colour our clothes, the pollution resulting from colouring the clothes can be stopped. Let everything remain in white natural colour. 
What about the companies that are going to be stopped, they would have debts to pay. The companies which cannot pay the debts just excuse them. We will think that if companies are going to be shut down then how the Industrialists and so many people who would lose their jobs, how will they survive. For that we have to make things free to the people.

2. Make Things Free To The Peoples

As I previously said to shut down many companies which are not required as a necessity for humans, if done then many would become jobless and lose their business. 
So to solve this problem the world has to make food, clothing, shelter, medicine, surgeries and education free to the peoples. If this step is taken then we can shut down any company we want. The government's of every country should arrange agricultural lands in new places for farming and supply water and seeds and all other things necessary for farming free to the people's who have lost their source of income and those who are already unemployed, if they do not have enough money to start farming on their own. If this is done then no one would starve for food and robberies can be reduced so much in the world.
Many people's should do agriculture and farming. Many people should study botany subject so that they have knowledge of plants and they should do farming. 

3. We Should Cook Foods In Its Natural Form

We can cook rice and wheat in our homes and eat it. Rice and Wheat is produced in farms. Then it is packed and transported to big warehouses, then wholesalers buy from them and supply to retail shops. 
But if a manufacturing company makes bread from rice and wheat, then to make bread a manufacturing company has to be set up, machines and working staffs are needed. When a company is built many other things are also needed. Then at last a plastic pack is required to pack the breads.
So if we start cooking eatable things in its natural form then we do not need many companies like bread manufacturing company, tomato ketchup, fruit jam, pizza, burger, etc., the things required for the company and the plastic pack, paper box pack and glass bottles. text:
Solutions For Pollution Problems

1. Many Production Companies Has To Be Stopped

We manufacture so many products and it is creating pollution and pollution has increased to such an extent that it has become a threat to the world. After 2045 climate change would give more problems and by 2100 we would start having major natural disasters. So if we can minimise our products, pollution would be less.
We produce so many things which we do not need as a necessity, like cold drinks, leather products, potato wafers, chips, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. Cold drinks, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. should be cooked at home only. Instead of cold drinks people should drink natural drinks such as lime water, coconut water or just any fruit, not any fruit juice, just the whole fruit which can be prepared or served when a customer comes in a shop, hotel or a person selling this drinks on a street and serve it to him. If we stopped producing this things so much pollution could be reduced. Also these companies need so much water and electricity, we could give that water and electricity to places where water and electricity supply is less. As the world is facing pollution problems, we should stop producing things which is not a necessity for humans. In this way we would create less pollution. These companies require so much boring underground water, the water when pumped out of the ground they flatten and sink the ground.
If we colour the clothes pollution occurs. So if we don't colour our clothes, the pollution resulting from colouring the clothes can be stopped. Let everything remain in white natural colour. 
What about the companies that are going to be stopped, they would have debts to pay. The companies which cannot pay the debts just excuse them. We will think that if companies are going to be shut down then how the Industrialists and so many people who would lose their jobs, how will they survive. For that we have to make things free to the people.

2. Make Things Free To The Peoples

As I previously said to shut down many companies which are not required as a necessity for humans, if done then many would become jobless and lose their business. 
So to solve this problem the world has to make food, clothing, shelter, medicine, surgeries and education free to the peoples. If this step is taken then we can shut down any company we want. The government's of every country should arrange agricultural lands in new places for farming and supply water and seeds and all other things necessary for farming free to the people's who have lost their source of income and those who are already unemployed, if they do not have enough money to start farming on their own. If this is done then no one would starve for food and robberies can be reduced so much in the world.
Many people's should do agriculture and farming. Many people should study botany subject so that they have knowledge of plants and they should do farming. 

3. We Should Cook Foods In Its Natural Form

We can cook rice and wheat in our homes and eat it. Rice and Wheat is produced in farms. Then it is packed and transported to big warehouses, then wholesalers buy from them and supply to retail shops. 
But if a manufacturing company makes bread from rice and wheat, then to make bread a manufacturing company has to be set up, machines and working staffs are needed. When a company is built many other things are also needed. Then at last a plastic pack is required to pack the breads.
So if we start cooking eatable things in its natural form then we do not need many companies like bread manufacturing company, tomato ketchup, fruit jam, pizza, burger, etc., the things required for the company and the plastic pack, paper box pack and glass bottles. If done like this, so many companies will not be required and hence less pollution for the world.
This must be done. The World is researching on how to clear the earth's pollution, but if we stopped many companies like bread manufacturing company and others which are not required as a necessity, so much pollution could be reduced and maybe we won't even have to research on how to clear the earth's pollution.

text:
Plastic pollution is a different problem to climate change. Banning plastic wouldn't necessarily solve all the problems we are facing. Plastic is the current solution for the resources we need and by banning it we would only exploit other materials instead which probably use more effort and energy to produce thus uses more fossil fuels and contributes to global warming instead. 

One of the things we can do about the plastic situation is to raise more awareness so people use less disposable plastic, banning all plastic isn't a viable solution at the moment, humans need more time to come up with new scientific solutions (eg another more eco-friendly substitute material or more awareness and education done on the subject) Change isn't happening fast enough.

Two authors I would recommend on AGW are Christopher Booker and Donna Laframboise. The latter takes a sledge hammer to the fools in the IPCC. One of my favourite newspaper articles is an article in the Guardian by Dutch economist Richard Toll, who happens to believe in AGW, about the daft Cook studyt (the '97%' one, or that should be spelt 'study'. text:
@Peter Thiessen   Coal & Oil Billionaires are INTENT of KEEPING their 
Multi-Trillion Dollar Cash Flow...and all that political power.
EVEN AT YOUR EXPENSE & YOUR GRAND CHILDRENS' Health.

35-40 Years ago I audited a History of Agriculture Lecture at UW, Madison.
The elderly Professor gave a 60-minute lecture, which felt like hours.
.
Totally boring except for the last question, as I recall.
.
A Gal ask a question that half-interested me

..."ignoring the machinery, What one thing stands-out in your mind as the 
most important change in farming over the last century.
.
He response was surprisingly quick.
....
"Climate."      
The FIRST Hard-Frost in the Fall of the year
(the traditional END of the harvest season) 
is "nearly a month LATER than it was a century ago".
.
Similarly, "the LAST-Hard Frost in the Spring "
(the traditional start of the planting season)
is a couple of weeks EARLIER than it was a century ago.
.
He went on to say, 
THIS longer growing season seems to be saving the Family Farm from extinction,
because it has enabled, in most years, for that Farm Family to plant & Harvest 
a 2nd crop...increasing the profitability, the viability of the Family Farm.
.
That Doesn't sound too controversial, does it?
.
By the time that old-timer got home, 
HIS ELDERLY WIFE had received DEATH THREATS 
and 
DEMANDS THAT HE RESIGN 
for using a University Lecture to " PREACH ABOUT POLITICAL ISSUES " 
like 
GLOBAL WARMING and CLIMATE CHANGE.
.
By the end of the week, the UNIVERSITY and the Professor had received hundreds 
of letters & phone calls, 
demanding a RETRACTION! An APOLOGY!  for his "ideological" rant.
..most demanding that he be fired !

By the end of the following week, he was forced to retire!

text:
Solutions For Pollution Problems

1. Many Production Companies Has To Be Stopped

We manufacture so many products and it is creating pollution and pollution has increased to such an extent that it has become a threat to the world. After 2045 climate change would give more problems and by 2100 we would start having major natural disasters. So if we can minimise our products, pollution would be less.
We produce so many things which we do not need as a necessity, like cold drinks, leather products, potato wafers, chips, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. Cold drinks, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. should be cooked at home only. Instead of cold drinks people should drink natural drinks such as lime water, coconut water or just any fruit, not any fruit juice, just the whole fruit which can be prepared or served when a customer comes in a shop, hotel or a person selling this drinks on a street and serve it to him. If we stopped producing this things so much pollution could be reduced. Also these companies need so much water and electricity, we could give that water and electricity to places where water and electricity supply is less. As the world is facing pollution problems, we should stop producing things which is not a necessity for humans. In this way we would create less pollution. These companies require so much boring underground water, the water when pumped out of the ground they flatten and sink the ground.
If we colour the clothes pollution occurs. So if we don't colour our clothes, the pollution resulting from colouring the clothes can be stopped. Let everything remain in white natural colour. 
What about the companies that are going to be stopped, they would have debts to pay. The companies which cannot pay the debts just excuse them. We will think that if companies are going to be shut down then how the Industrialists and so many people who would lose their jobs, how will they survive. For that we have to make things free to the people.

2. Make Things Free To The Peoples

As I previously said to shut down many companies which are not required as a necessity for humans, if done then many would become jobless and lose their business. 
So to solve this problem the world has to make food, clothing, shelter, medicine, surgeries and education free to the peoples. If this step is taken then we can shut down any company we want. The government's of every country should arrange agricultural lands in new places for farming and supply water and seeds and all other things necessary for farming free to the people's who have lost their source of income and those who are already unemployed, if they do not have enough money to start farming on their own. If this is done then no one would starve for food and robberies can be reduced so much in the world.
Many people's should do agriculture and farming. Many people should study botany subject so that they have knowledge of plants and they should do farming. 

3. We Should Cook Foods In Its Natural Form

We can cook rice and wheat in our homes and eat it. Rice and Wheat is produced in farms. Then it is packed and transported to big warehouses, then wholesalers buy from them and supply to retail shops. 
But if a manufacturing company makes bread from rice and wheat, then to make bread a manufacturing company has to be set up, machines and working staffs are needed. When a company is built many other things are also needed. Then at last a plastic pack is required to pack the breads.
So if we start cooking eatable things in its natural form then we do not need many companies like bread manufacturing company, tomato ketchup, fruit jam, pizza, burger, etc., the things required for the company and the plastic pack, paper box pack and glass bottles. If done like this, so many companies will not be required and hence less pollution for the world.
This must be done. The World is researching on how to clear the earth's pollution, but if we stopped many companies like bread manufacturing company and others which are not required as a necessity, so much pollution could be reduced and maybe we won't even have to research on how to clear the earth's pollution.

I believe in Climate Change, as science shows it's been happening since beginning of the Earth, even when we weren't causing greenhouse gasses. I guess there were greenhouse gasses anyway, even before man? Must have been the Dino farts. We all recognize that since the 50s or 60s, we have known there was a problem, and as human nature goes, we don't worry about it till it's at crisis point. Are we mad at our ancestors before us? This video suggests to "do something" we are to go around and make our voices heard, about Climate Change, and nonlistenjng politicians, to DO something. I would suggest what we control is no more than ourselves. Of course it's possible to influence others, but influence doesn't happen in a spirit of superiority and anger. If you want people to do things or buy from you, you MUST make them like you. Therefore, it looks like we aren't making much progress. I'm an adult. I don't like being blasted about what I need to do. What about the people before us? What about instead of blasting others we do something to improve situation, and tell others what we did? The statement in this video that $ is only reason the World continues to use fossil fuels is way off. Fossil fuels provide heat. Maybe ok with some if we don't have heat and people freeze in their own homes, but if the frozen person is related to you, still all good? Why haven't grocers upgraded to paperless shopping? No wrapping, cardboard, plastics to package products? You know, like the old time milk man. Instead of "calling others out" why aren't leaders meeting with Grocery Companies to put pressure, like PETA? All we need us available permanent vessels to pack food into, and large bins holding bulk foods, from which customers fill their containers? How about no baggues, paper cups plates, zip locks? That's easy enough. Stop driving so much instead have grocer, hair dresser,  insurance, all manner of business in mobile offices, working thru streets of neighborhoods. 
I heard last winter that a group of college student activists went to the dean if their college to insist he stop investing into stocks associated with fossil fuels. He immediately agreed, asking them if they had warm clothes since he was turning their heat off. They changed their mind. 
Blaming politicians and others us is irresponsible and lazy. Do something for yourself, and talk about that.

text:
Solutions For Pollution Problems

1. Many Production Companies Has To Be Stopped

We manufacture so many products and it is creating pollution and pollution has increased to such an extent that it has become a threat to the world. After 2045 climate change would give more problems and by 2100 we would start having major natural disasters. So if we can minimise our products, pollution would be less.
We produce so many things which we do not need as a necessity, like cold drinks, leather products, potato wafers, chips, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. Cold drinks, fruit juices, chocolates, biscuits, pickles, ice creams, etc. should be cooked at home only. Instead of cold drinks people should drink natural drinks such as lime water, coconut water or just any fruit, not any fruit juice, just the whole fruit which can be prepared or served when a customer comes in a shop, hotel or a person selling this drinks on a street and serve it to him. If we stopped producing this things so much pollution could be reduced. Also these companies need so much water and electricity, we could give that water and electricity to places where water and electricity supply is less. As the world is facing pollution problems, we should stop producing things which is not a necessity for humans. In this way we would create less pollution. These companies require so much boring underground water, the water when pumped out of the ground they flatten and sink the ground.
If we colour the clothes pollution occurs. So if we don't colour our clothes, the pollution resulting from colouring the clothes can be stopped. Let everything remain in white natural colour. 
What about the companies that are going to be stopped, they would have debts to pay. The companies which cannot pay the debts just excuse them. We will think that if companies are going to be shut down then how the Industrialists and so many people who would lose their jobs, how will they survive. For that we have to make things free to the people.

2. Make Things Free To The Peoples

As I previously said to shut down many companies which are not required as a necessity for humans, if done then many would become jobless and lose their business. 
So to solve this problem the world has to make food, medicine, surgeries and education free to the peoples. If this step is taken then we can shut down any company we want. The government's of every country should arrange agricultural lands in new places for farming and supply water and seeds and all other things necessary for farming free to the people's who have lost their source of income and those who are already unemployed, if they do not have enough money to start farming on their own. If this is done then no one would starve for food and robberies can be reduced so much in the world.
Many people's should do agriculture and farming. Many people should study botany subject so that they have knowledge of plants and they should do farming. 

3. We Should Cook Foods In Its Natural Form

We can cook rice and wheat in our homes and eat it. Rice and Wheat is produced in farms. Then it is packed and transported to big warehouses, then wholesalers buy from them and supply to retail shops. 
But if a manufacturing company makes bread from rice and wheat, then to make bread a manufacturing company has to be set up, machines and working staffs are needed. When a company is built many other things are also needed. Then at last a plastic pack is required to pack the breads.
So if we start cooking eatable things in its natural form then we do not need many companies like bread manufacturing company, tomato ketchup, fruit jam, pizza, burger, etc., the things required for the company and the plastic pack, paper box pack and glass bottles. If done like this, so many companies will not be required and hence less pollution for the world.
This must be done. The World is researching on how to clear the earth's pollution, but if we stopped many companies like bread manufacturing company and others which are not required as a necessity, so much pollution could be reduced and maybe we won't even have to research on how to clear the earth's pollution.

text:
If not for the Greenhouse Effect, Earth would be Snowball Earth. It is because of the trace amounts of water vapor, carbon dioxide, methane and nitrous oxide in the atmosphere that absorb and re-emit energy that Earth’s average temperature is not permanently well below the freezing temperature of water.

“However, one needs to distinguish between the natural greenhouse effect and the enhanced greenhouse effect. The natural greenhouse effect is caused by the natural amounts of greenhouse gases, and is vital to life. In the absence of the natural greenhouse effect the surface of the Earth would be approximately 33 degrees Celsius cooler. The enhanced greenhouse effect refers to the additional radiative forcing resulting from increased concentrations of greenhouse gases induced by human activities. The main greenhouse gases whose concentrations are rising are carbon dioxide, methane, nitrous oxide, hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs), hydrofluorocarbons (HFCs) and ozone in the lower atmosphere.”

https://samslair.blogspot.com/search?q=Greenhouse+effect&max-results=20&by-date=false&m=1

As global climate change proceeds, generally speaking, dry areas will become drier and moist areas wetter.

text:
@Jason Torres  https://spaceweatherarchive.com/2019/04/10/experts-predict-the-solar-cycle/

We are indeed headed for a solar minimum. 

However it DOES NOT MEAN we are headed into the "next ice age"
Firstly, there's the uncertainty that a so called prolonged solar minimum will even occur.
 https://www.livescience.com/61716-sun-cooling-global-warming.html

"But it's unlikely that we'll see a return to the extreme cold from centuries ago, researchers reported in a new study. Since the Maunder Minimum, global average temperatures have been on the rise, driven by climate change. Though a new decades-long dip in solar radiation could slow global warming somewhat, it wouldn't be by much, the researchers' simulations demonstrated. "

Then, as already mentioned, even a grand minimum will not definitively result in an "ice age". 
Don't just read one clickbait headline. Out of all the news sites, only a few dubious ones claim that an "ice age" could approach. View the news from different outlet and from the source itself(https://www.nature.com/articles/ncomms8535).

I plead with you - we are still facing a climate crisis. A solar minimum will only provide temporary time for us to quickly cut our emissions- remember that doing otherwise will be disasterous.
author: Stwinge44

text:
Eons of Global Warming and Cooling Associated With CO2 Fluctuations

After the Earth first formed, the temperatures were higher than they are now. Anaerobic life evolved and flourished in conditions with high methane and CO2 levels for hundreds of millions of years. Then Cyanobacteria came into being and consumed the CO2 while releasing oxygen, creating a great dying off of the anaerobics.  The CO2 levels got so low that the Earth became what scientists call Snowball Earth. Eventually, however, the CO2 and oxygen levels balanced out and new life forms evolved and flourished in the pre-Cambrian Period. After this, the only times that great extinctions occurred were when CO2 levels soared due to extended periods of basaltic flows such as those that created the Siberian Traps (associated with the Great Dying) and the Deccan traps (that drove the dinosaurs towards extinction before the Chicxulub asteroid strike).

Note: To deny the physical science of the greenhouse effect is just plain silly. Watch and learn (4 minute simple demonstration):
https://youtu.be/kwtt51gvaJQ

The project "Global Warming Petition" shows the state of science based on effective scientific facts.

31,487 American scientists say that global warming is not human-caused and there is no cause for any alarm over our CO2 emissions. They signed a petition with the following purpose:

The purpose of the Petition Project is to demonstrate that the claim of “settled science” and an overwhelming “consensus” in favor of the hypothesis of human-caused global warming and consequent climatological damage is wrong. No such consensus or settled science exists. As indicated by the petition text and signatory list, a very large number of American scientists reject this hypothesis.

Publicists at the United Nations, Mr. Al Gore, and their supporters frequently claim that only a few “skeptics” remain – skeptics who are still unconvinced about the existence of a catastrophic human-caused global warming emergency.

It is evident that 31,487 Americans with university degrees in science – including 9,029 PhDs, are not "a few." Moreover, from the clear and strong petition statement that they have signed, it is evident that these 31,487 American scientists are not “skeptics.”

These scientists are instead convinced that the human-caused global warming hypothesis is without scientific validity and that government action on the basis of this hypothesis would unnecessarily and counterproductively damage both human prosperity and the natural environment of the Earth.

Nobody can ignore the fact that 31,487 American scientists have signed this petition, including 9,029 with PhDs – http://www.petitionproject.org

NOAA’s US temperature record shows that US was warmest in the 1930’s and has generally cooled as CO2 has increased and Al Gore has been made to look a fool!

There was never any ‘global warming’. Any NOAA numbers that showed there was an increase in temperature were manipulated, and what we have left is pre-manipulation of a natural warming and cooling trend.

The real temperatures we are dealing with today are not historic, and in fact, are lower than pre-industrial revolution temperatures.

Al Gore Scared: Latest NOAA Data Proves There Was NEVER 'Global Warming'
Rev-In Article
READ: Climate Change Hoax: NOAA Caught MASSIVELY Manipulating Temperature Readings AGAIN
It was all one…great..BIG…hoax.

That temperatures were warmer in the 30’s and have generally decreased as CO2 has increased, wrecks greenhouse gas theory. So the NOAA had to “adjust” the data to make it look like the US is warming.

The problem, is that time and time again, they have been caught adjusting.

They do not just adjust recent temperatures to show them warmer, they adjusted, significantly, numbers from the early part of the 20th Century downward. This, enabled them to perpetrate the global warming hoax.
RealClimateScience explains:
Adsense_Native_In_Article

    The NOAA data tampering produces a spectacular hockey stick of scientific fraud. It becomes the basis of vast amounts of downstream junk climate science. Pre-2000 temperatures are progressively cooled Post-2000 temperatures are warmed. This year has been a particularly spectacular episode of data tampering by NOAA. They introduced nearly 2.5 degrees of fake warming since 1895.

    Most of these adjustments are due to simply making up data. Every month, a certain percentage of the 1,218 United States Historical Climatology Network (USHCN) stations fail to report their data. The temperature gets estimated by NOAA using a computer model. Missing data is marked in the USHCN database with an “E” – meaning “estimated.” In 1970, about 10% of the data was missing. That number has increased to almost 50%. That translates to almost half of the current adjusted data being fake.

    The fabricated temperatures have warmed four degrees since 1970, relative to the adjusted temperatures which were based on actual station data. This shows that the warming trend in the US claimed by NOAA is based on computer models. Not actual thermometer data or even adjusted thermometer data.

    But here is the real smoking gun of fraud by NOAA. The adjustments being made almost perfectly match atmospheric CO2 levels – showing that the data is being altered precisely to match global warming theory.

    Science doesn’t get any worse than how NOAA handles US temperature data. NASA uses the NOAA data as the basis for their temperature graphs, which have also been massively altered to turn cooling into warming.

text: Most men in the US and Europe could be infertile by 2050, according to a new study. ... Sperm count in men from North America, Europe, Australia and New Zealand declined by 50-60% between 1973 and 2011, according to a new study from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.Infertility is becoming a public health issue in Europe. Declining birth rates over the past 50 years mean that Europe is only producing 1.6 children per woman – hardly satisfactory to compete on the global stage against increasing populations of fit and able youth from the emerging economies of India and Africa and South America.A prominent reason for reduced fertility is the age-related decline in the number and quality of eggs as women in all European countries wait longer to have their first birth.Mass infertility is the 'logical conclusion' to the current patterns, according to one expert. "If the data on sperm counts is extrapolated to its logical conclusion,European men will have little or no reproductive capacity from 2060 onward," wrote Chris Barratt, Professor of Reproductive Medicine at the University of Dundee  Europe Infertility testing and treatment market generated a revenue of $5874 million in 2016 and is anticipated to contribute $9874 million by 2025, growing at a CAGR of 6.01%. Europe has the largest market share of In-vitro fertilization market. Variation in skin color is the most noticeable of human polymorphisms. As visually dominant mammals, we readily notice differences in skin color in each other. As primates who uniquely use language to create categories, we readily give names to these differences. Since the mid-18th century, skin color has been the single most important physical trait used to define human groups. The prevalence of skin cancers is highest in lightly pigmented people who experience chronic or intense episodic exposures to strong UVR in places far from their ancestral homelands (MacKie et al., 2009). Skin cancers are mostly a consequence of modern human migrations and resulting mismatches between skin pigmentation and geography or lifestyle.dark skin pigmentation in humans had evolved primarily to prevent reduction of fertility due to the photolysis of folate present in cutaneous blood vessels (Jablonski and Chaplin, 2000). We presented evidence that folate depletion by UVR would precipitate folate deficiencies that would, in turn, lead to potentially fatal birth defects such as neural tube defects (NTDs). Dark skin pigmentation in humans evolved primarily to prevent reduction of fertility due to the photolysis of folate present in cutaneous blood vessels and destruction of DNA (Jablonski and Chaplin, 2000).Folate is important especially in rapidly dividing cells, such as those of the embryo and seminiferous tubules. Thus folate deficiencies caused by UVR would potentially affect both female and male fertility. Low folate levels cause derangements of folate-mediated 1-carbon metabolism that lead to serious diseases and birth defects. Folate deficiencies cause faulty DNA replication due to strand breaks caused by misincorporation of excessive uracil into DNA (Han et al., 2007; Stover, 2009). Studies from Africa have demonstrated that black people have higher vitamin B12 (cobalamin) levels than do white people. The dark skin of humans naturally arose because women who were darker skinned carried more normal fetuses to term than those who were light skinned. In dark skinned populations the MC1R locus is extremely conserved, suggesting powerful selective constraints which prevent sequence variation. No matter the phylogenetic relationships between dark skinned populations there is a consensus sequence which seems to have been selected for deep in the human past which remains the norm across these groups (i.e., though Melanesians and Africans are both very distantly related their dark skin is the end product of the same genetic architecture). But counterbalancing the need to block sunlight due to reduction in folate levels is the fact that vitamin D synthesis requires a minimum level of radiation to be catalyzed. Reduced vitamin D levels in caucasians not only result in bone deformations (i.e., rickets), but a heightened sensitivity to a host of diseases.

text: This is complete hysteria. Complete. Please, please, PLEASE just do a little research before churning out videos copied directly from media outputs. Look in to geology. Look into the history of the earth. Learn about the water cycle. Learn about the carbon cycle. Learn about BIOLOGY. PLEASE. Seriously, no one disputes that climate changes. It always has and always will, no matter what we do. But I beg you, learn a little about how life on earth works and how it has evolved before you brand carbon dioxide as some sort of 'zombie apocalypse' pollutant that we need to banish from the atmosphere for ever. Without CO2 in the atmosphere, zero life, yes ZERO, life exists in the form we currently entertain it. Having CO2 levels at 'target' 150ppm levels will essentially suffocate the photosynthesising plant life. And I don't need to tell you that if the plants die, we die. Not because we can't eat them, but because they produce the oxygen used in our own respiration. To say the CO2 levels currently are historically high is simply wrong. Even at current 400ppm levels, plants are on starvation rations. Look into geology and you'll realise hat levels of CO2 topping 2000ppm are not uncommon. Many many other, and more important, factors play a role in the climate of the planet apart from CO2. Water vapour and clouds will do multiples more to effect it than CO2 ever will. Please, don't just believe what you hear. Don't just believe me. Look into it. Do some study and draw your own conclusions. The climate may well be changing , but we're changing out of one of the coldest periods the earth has ever had, seriously. As Aden Bulgy correctly points out - we are currently in an Ice Age Ingerglacial. You want to stop the earth from warming up and doing what it it does. But have you ever asked the question; 'what would it be like if we do stop the warming and actually cool the planet down by 2 or 3 degrees?'. Probably not, because that would be getting closer to the 'zombie apocalypse' you talk of. Like it or lump it, life prefers warm to cold. Full stop.
